articles.title: Air India Flights Avoid Iranian Airspace Amid Rising Tensions In West Asia - NDTV
articles.description: Air India flights today avoided venturing into Iranian airspace as tensions soar in the Middle East after Iran warned of a retaliatory attack on Israel.
articles.content:
Sources say Air India flights to Europe took longer routes to avoid Iranian airspace.
New Delhi: Air India flights have begun avoiding Iranian airspace amid soaring Middle East tensions as warnings … [+2429 chars]
